typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		lin_no as integer,
		out_text as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> PrimarySelect
source(output(
		manufact as string,
		part as string,
		weblink as string,
		qty as integer,
		delivery as string,
		oq1 as integer,
		op1 as decimal(19,3),
		oq2 as integer,
		op2 as decimal(19,3),
		oq3 as integer,
		op3 as decimal(19,3),
		oq4 as integer,
		op4 as decimal(19,3),
		oq5 as integer,
		op5 as decimal(19,3),
		oq6 as integer,
		op6 as decimal(19,3),
		oq7 as integer,
		op7 as decimal(19,3),
		oq8 as integer,
		op8 as decimal(19,3),
		oq9 as integer,
		op9 as decimal(19,3),
		oq10 as integer,
		op10 as decimal(19,3),
		oq11 as integer,
		op11 as decimal(19,3),
		vdesc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PricingTable1
Sort1 select(mapColumn(
		out_text
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
PrimarySelect sort(asc(lin_no, true)) ~> Sort1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'datagactoryfiles',
	folderPath: 'ECIA',
	columnDelimiter: '',
	escapeChar: '',
	quoteChar: '',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ECIAGlobalStandardRegion1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
PricingTable1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'datafactoryfiles',
	folderPath: 'PriceFiles',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PricingLevel1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
